title: How long does it take blitzcrank bot to respond
body:
I got locked out of my account, cant remember my password on my other account. 

I emailed support and got a list of requests from blitzcrank bot. I was able to remember 95% of them. How long will it take him to solve the issue

My main problem is I am not even receiving a password reset link to my email, but I do receive the username email

replies.body: I know it sucks when you can't access your account, but account recoveries can take some time. I recommend you continue to be patient while our account specialists investigate this and work with you on resolving it.
